thread.title: Allegiant Grows Service in Phoenix with Three New Nonstop Routes and Fares as low as $49Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Allegiant Grows Service in Phoenix with Three New Nonstop Routes and Fares as low as $49Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Allegiant Grows Service in Phoenix with Three New Nonstop Routes and Fares as low as $49Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Allegiant Grows Service in Phoenix with Three New Nonstop Routes and Fares as low as $49 Published on : Thursday, September 10, 2015
Allegiant today celebrates the announcement of new, low-cost, nonstop service to Phoenix / Mesa from Des Moines, Fresno and Memphis beginning Dec. 17, 2015. The company, known for its exceptional travel deals, is offering one-way fares as low as $49*.
“Allegiant is pleased to announce new service to the Phoenix area, giving the people of Des Moines, Fresno and Memphis an ultra-low-cost, nonstop option to this world-renowned vacation destination,” said Jude Bricker, Allegiant Travel Company senior vice president of planning. “We know there is pent-up demand in these three communities for our convenient service to this popular destination, and we look forward to bringing even more visitors and economic growth to the area.”
New year-round routes announced to Phoenix / Mesa Gateway Airport (AZA) include:
1. Fresno, Calif. – Dec. 17, 2015 with fares as low as $49*
2. Memphis, Tenn. – Dec. 17, 2015 with fares as low as $71*
3. Des Moines, Iowa – Dec. 18, 2015 with fares as low as $71*
The new flights will operate twice weekly and expand on the service Allegiant currently operates to Phoenix / Mesa Gateway Airport (AZA). Focusing on leisure travelers, the new flights will bring over 100,000 additional visitors each year to the Phoenix area.
Allegiant’s innovative business model has allowed it to grow from one plane and one route to offering access to low-cost flights in over 100 cities nationwide, more than any other domestic low-cost carrier. Allegiant passengers can enjoy unique savings by bundling their air, hotel, car and even activity and attraction reservations together for less.
Source:- Allegiant Air
